synthesis_conditions.equipment: quartz flask with a Rayonet photochemical reactor (1849 A-2537 A)

additional_steps.description: Performed after irradiation to produce 12 (Z = COOH)

synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvent: minimum amount of ethanol, 80 mL of water
synthesis_conditions.method: Slow addition of sodium oxalate to the solution of 2,2'-Bipyrimidine and Cu(NO3)2 . 3 H2O in ethanol and water, followed by evaporation at room temperature to yield blue hexagonal crystals.
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: filtered off and dried on filter paper

synthesis_conditions.method: Solution of Cu(NO3)2 . 3 H2O added to an aqueous solution of 1, followed by slow evaporation to yield cubic green crystals.
